articles.title: Newly discovered dinosaur predated tyrannosaurs — and at the time was a bigger apex predator - CBC.ca
articles.description: A previously unknown species may become another piece in the puzzle of how tyrannosaurs took over and ruled Asia and North America for millennia.
articles.content:
It's roughly 90 million years ago, the Cretaceous period, and continents have begun to rift apart.
